txt.en: Defend Stóthkell
Speak to Stóthkell
The Smithway has been defended
Dwarves defeated ([placeholder]/8)
A forge has been overrun
You have travelled to the Way of Smiths to aid in its defence. Follow Stóthkell's direction and help the Dwarves of Moria make their stand!
Stóthkell has been defeated

'Ah, I fear you have wasted your time coming here, [placeholder]. With the way shut, we shall have no problems with the Orcs. Those witless fools have no chance of forcing this door open.\n\n'I wish I could see the look on Amukh's face. Amukh is a goblin who has crafted many foul blades for his Orc masters, but has boasted that his work is as good as dwarf-make! The fool goblin even thought to claim these dwarf works for his own foul purposes! As long as I draw breath, that shall never happen!'
Speak to Stóthkell to see what aid you might lend in the defence.

'I am mortified, [placeholder]. My pride nearly lead to Zigilburk being lost to us! If it were not for you and your companions, we would not have withstood this day.\n\n'You have my sincerest thanks. You are a true dwarf-friend.'
Follow Stóthkell to learn the source of what is shaking the Way of the Smiths.
Help hold the Way of Smiths against Mazog's assault.
'There is little else for you to do here now, [placeholder]. Do you wish to leave with me?'
With the Orcs driven off, you should speak to Stóthkell to see if there is anything else he would have you do.
Speak to Stóthkell
Follow Stóthkell
Defend the Smithway
Prevent dwarves from being defeated ([placeholder]/8)
Instance: The Battle of the Way of Smiths
Prevent a forge from being overrun
